柶字的基本解释

柶
sì
古代舀取食物的礼器，像勺子，多用角做成：“有筐、实勺、觯、角柶。”

柶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sì］
［《廣韻》息利切，去至，心。］
古代礼器。用角、木等材料制成，形状和功用如匙，用以舀取食物。

柶字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　柶； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页521第08
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】息利切【正韻】息漬切，?音四。【說文】匕也。【禮·聘禮】宰夫實觶以醴，加柶于觶。【周禮·漿人註】飮醴用柶者，糟也。不用柶者，漿也。　又角柶，喪禮所用。【禮·喪大記註】以角爲之，長六寸，兩頭屈曲。

考證：〔【禮·聘禮】宰夫實觶于醴。〕　謹照原文于改以。
柶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
柶字的起名意思

暂无。

ladle
Basic explanation of words
ladle
sì
In ancient times, the ritual vessel for scooping food was like a spoon. It was mostly made of horns: "There are baskets, real spoons, hoops, and horns."
ladle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sì］
["Guangyun" Xiliqi, go to, heart. ]
Ancient ritual vessels. It is made of horns, wood and other materials, and has a shape and function like a spoon, used to scoop food.
ladle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　柶; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 521 08
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Xiliqie [Zhengyun] Xiliqie,? Sound four. [Said the text] Dagger too. 【Rite·Borrowing】The husband is actually looking to the li, and adding it to the chasing. [Zhou Li·Xianren's Note] Those who use Cao Li, it’s bad. Those who don't need to squeeze, the pulp is also.　Jiao Chui, used in funerals. 【Notes on Ceremony and Funeral Records】It is based on the horns, six inches long, with both ends buckled. Textual research: [[Rituals·Borrowing Ceremony] The husband is actually looking at Yuli. 〕 　 I would like to modify it according to the original text.
